sqlMap.select:
select b.* from( select a.* from( select unq, title, name, hits, date_format(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') rdate from board
where category = 0 and $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc) a) b limit #startIndex#,#endIndex#
select unq, title, name, hits, date_format(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') rdate from noticeboard order by unq desc

select count(*) total from board
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
select unq , title , pass , name , content , hits , date_format(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d') rdate from board where unq=#unq#
